scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend/student-app && npm install && cd ../teacher-panel && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently "npm run dev:student" "npm run dev:teacher" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../auth-service && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend/student-app && npm run build && cd ../teacher-panel && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
scripts.db:setup: cd backend/auth-service && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend/auth-service && npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm test && cd ../auth-service && npm test
